name: Debela Trust
about: Debela Training and Management (DTM) is a renowned aviation training institution specializing in courses for Aircraft Maintenance Engineers (AME) and support staff. Located in a tranquil bushveld setting near Lanseria International Airport in Johannesburg, DTM offers a serene learning environment. Our courses include AME training, store keeping, aviation quality assurance, maintenance planning, and more, all compliant with SACAA regulations. We provide on-site accommodation and meals for convenience. With plans to introduce online courses, DTM ensures global accessibility. Our facility is ideal for focused learning, and we are committed to delivering high-quality training in a supportive and peaceful atmosphere. DTM is dedicated to preparing students for successful careers in aviation.
services: ["Flight Operations Officer\nTrain The Trainer Refresher\nMaintenance Human Factors Refresher"]
